True education strengthens the moral powers, expands the mind, and should be cultivated. But the grand educating book found in nature, which hears and sees God, has been greatly neglected. God help us to teach correctly what constitutes an all-sided education.--Letter 121, 1896, p. 7. (To Mr. and Mrs. J. E. White, April 11, 1896.)
